alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 12:24PM MST until December 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe County, Quay County, Eastern San Miguel County, Far Northeast Highlands, Harding County, Northeast Highlands and Union County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north to south oriented roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Areas of blowing dust will be possible in the eastern plains. Strong crosswinds can be expected on northwest-to-southeast oriented roads, including U.S. 84 and 285.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Union County
